data.message: I will not be installing your messenger app. Regrettably I don't care for you to have access to my phone contacts or Camera information ect. Why couldn't you just keep things simple and allow us to have a private message system under the normality of Facebook contacts? If a competing system comes along that allows privacy and not trying to profile like you are I'll be there in a heartbeat. I think many of my friends will as well.

replies.message: I believe that service is called "text messaging"
